author: diguida
body: This PR updates the "default" Express GT, i.e. the fall-back to be used in case we are not able to retrieve the one used at Tier0, in `DQM/Integration/python/config/FrontierCondition_GT_autoExpress_cfi.py` for the Event Display online application, to keep it synchronized with the Era change in Tier0 processing.
title: Update the fall-back Express GT for Event Display after the Era change in Tier0
